data: Hanson, Kael D Kael D Hanson Professor, WIPAC Director kael.hanson@wisc.edu (608) 890-0540 4207 Chamberlin Hall IceCube Directions to room 4207, Chamberlin Hall or stairs to the 4th floor. Facing into the hallway, away from the two elevators, turn right. Follow the hallway to room 4207, which will be on your left. IceCube in lights Madison, WI, holiday light show features an IceCube display. Searching for sub-TeV neutrinos Can a high-energy neutrino detector see low-energy neutrinos? Week 52 at the Pole The South Pole has its traditions for ringing in the new year, which includes a ceremony at the geographic pole to set a new pole marker into place.
